item.title: The Dark Knight
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Batman! We were just walking along in the loop when my brother Marc goes, check that out. I'm like what? It's a police truck. He replies "Read the truck". Yup it was all decked out for the Gotham Police, which means filming for "The Dark Knight" was nearby somewhere.
